snippet.title: Journey of the Broken Circle Release Trailer - PC/Switch/Xbox One/PS4
snippet.description:
Journey of the Broken Circle is a game about falling in love and falling out of love.

It is a beautiful, fun and intriguing game about a broken Circle setting out on an existential journey to look for something to complete it.

By overcoming obstacles and entering relationships with different pieces the Circle grows and develops as a character. It learns about the world and itself, and we, along with it.

The game will is available on PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PS4.

Get it now on 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1179620/Journey_of_the_Broken_Circle/
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/journey-of-the-broken-circle-switch/
Xbox One:
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/journey-of-the-broken-circle/9NRHR86QDVFB
PS4:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10002238

Music by Scntfc
https://distrokid.com/hyperfollow/scntfc/broken-circle
